title: LAG LIKE HELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL
body: My ping today spikes from 100-1000+ and regardless of ping my characters glides around the whole map and my skills takes forever to cast. Other than that after i complete a game my match history isn't updated. This problem appear a lot to me after the recent patches. I remember i posted something similar a while ago and someone at riot says that im experiencing Mass Packet loss. I haven't receive any reply email after i sent the Network diagnostic through a website.

replies.body:
Get better internet.
or suffer.

I chose suffering because I have low money.

I had this problem awhile ago my Wi-Fi had its settings fucked up for some resone mite be a good idea to have a look at them just encase also windows 10 is a bit buggy atm so that could do it as well I haven't upgraded cos my brother cant play on his laptop because of windows 10
